name: fridays-backend-root
description: Fridays Perú - Sistema de Gestión de Pedidos

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:dynamodb
scripts.install:all: cd services/ecommerce-service && npm install && cd ../kitchen-service && npm install && cd ../delivery-service && npm install && cd ../admin-service && npm install && cd ../websocket-service && npm install
scripts.local:dynamodb:stop: docker stop dynamodb-local && docker rm dynamodb-local
scripts.setup:dynamodb: npm run setup:tables && npm run seed:data
scripts.dev:ecommerce: cd services/ecommerce-service && serverless offline start --stage local
scripts.dev:kitchen: cd services/kitchen-service && serverless offline start --stage local
scripts.dev:delivery: cd services/delivery-service && serverless offline start --stage local
scripts.dev:admin: cd services/admin-service && serverless offline start --stage local
scripts.dev:websocket: cd services/websocket-service && serverless offline start --stage local
scripts.deploy:ecommerce: cd services/ecommerce-service && serverless deploy --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev --verbose
scripts.deploy:kitchen: cd services/kitchen-service && serverless deploy --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev --verbose
scripts.deploy:delivery: cd services/delivery-service && serverless deploy --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev --verbose
scripts.deploy:admin: cd services/admin-service && serverless deploy --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev --verbose
scripts.deploy:websocket: cd services/websocket-service && serverless deploy --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev --verbose
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:ecommerce && npm run deploy:kitchen && npm run deploy:delivery && npm run deploy:admin && npm run deploy:websocket
scripts.remove:ecommerce: cd services/ecommerce-service && serverless remove --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev
scripts.remove:kitchen: cd services/kitchen-service && serverless remove --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev
scripts.remove:delivery: cd services/delivery-service && serverless remove --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev
scripts.remove:admin: cd services/admin-service && serverless remove --stage dev --aws-profile fridays-dev
scripts.logs:delivery: cd services/delivery-service && serverless logs -f assignDriver --stage dev --tail --aws-profile fridays-dev
scripts.logs:admin: cd services/admin-service && serverless logs -f getDashboard --stage dev --tail --aws-profile fridays-dev

author: Equipo Fridays Perú
